#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>
#include <vector>
#include <map>
#include <queue>
#include <stack>
#include <cstring>
#include <algorithm>
#include <cstdlib>
#include <cmath>
#include <set>
using namespace std;
#define w(t) while(t--)
#define S(x) scanf("%d",&x)
#define SLL(x) scanf("%lld",&x)
#define P(x) printf("%d",x)
#define fl(i , a, b) for(i = (int)a; i<(int)b; i++)
#define mem(a , value) memset(a , value , sizeof(a))
#define tr(c, itr) for(itr = (c).begin(); itr != (c).end(); itr++)
#define MOD 1000000007
#define MAX 1000000010
#define ll long long
#define mp make_pair
#define pb push_back
typedef pair<int,int> pp;
int main()
{
	//std::ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
	int t , i ,  d  ,re;
	string s , ans, tmp ;
	cin >> t;
	w(t){
		cin >> s;
		cin >> d;
		int n = s.size();
		re = n - d + 1;
		re  = n - re ;
		tmp = "";
		ans = "";  
		fl(i , 0 ,re)
		tmp+=s[i];
		fl(i , re , n)
		ans+= s[i];
		if(d % 2==0)
		{
			if(n % 2 ==0 )
			reverse(tmp.begin(), tmp.end());
			ans+= tmp ;
		}
		else{
			if(n%2==0)
			ans += tmp ;
			else{
				reverse(tmp.begin(), tmp.end());
				ans+= tmp ;
			}
		}
		cout << ans << endl; 
	}
	return 0;
}
